words.ENTRY: <H>jacket</H><audio>jacket.mp3</audio><PS>noun</PS><bracket>countable</bracket><D>a short coat with sleeves:</D> <X>a tweed sports jacket</X><dot><X>It's getting cold; put on your jacket.</X>
jeansnounpluralpants made of strong, usually blue, cotton cloth (denim): These jeans are a little too tight.a pair of jeans

<H>job</H><audio>job.mp3</audio><PS>noun</PS><NR>1.</NR><bracket>countable</bracket><D>the work that you do to earn money:</D> <X>My dad told me to go out and get a job.</X><NR>2.</NR><bracket>countable</bracket><D>a task or a piece of work that may be paid or unpaid:</D> <X>I always have a lot of jobs to do around the house on weekends.</X>
<H>jog</H><audio>jog.mp3</audio><PS>verb</PS>(<DR>jogging</DR>; <DR>jogged</DR>) <D>to run slowly, especially as a form of exercise:</D> <X>I go jogging in the park every day.</X>

<H>journalism</H><audio>journalism.mp3</audio><PS>noun</PS><bracket>uncountable</bracket><D>the profession of collecting, writing, and publishing news in newspapers and magazines and on television, radio, and the Internet</D>

<H>journalist</H><audio>journalist.mp3</audio><PS>noun</PS><bracket>countable</bracket><D>a person whose job is to collect, write, or publish news, in newspapers and magazines or on television, radio, and the Internet:</D> <X>He got a job as a journalist with the local newspaper.</X>

<H>juice</H><audio>juice.mp3</audio><PS>noun</PS><bracket>countable, uncountable</bracket><D>the (drinkable) liquid that comes from fruit and vegetables:</D> <bracket>uncountable</bracket><X>lemon juice</X><dot><bracket>countable</bracket><X>I'll have a large orange juice.</X>

<H>just</H><audio>just.mp3</audio><PS>adverb</PS><NR>1.</NR><D>exactly:</D> <X>That's just what I meant.</X><dot><X>You're just as smart as he is.</X><NR>2.</NR><D>only:</D> <X>She's just a child.</X><dot><X>Just a minute! I'm almost ready.</X><NR>3.</NR><D>a very short time ago:</D> <X>She's just been offered a new job.</X><dot><X>He'd just returned from the Bahamas when I saw him.</X><dot><X>I just ate a candy bar, so I'm not hungry.</X>
